message: ...Thirty minutes have passed, and Noiz hasn't returned.
...Something's wrong.
Something must've happened. Maybe someone caught him.
I don't want to be a pessimist, but no matter how competent Noiz is, I can't ignore the possibility.
Maybe I should―
"This is an emergency alert. In five minutes, all hallways will be sealed."
"This is a temporary system shutdown. All personnel in the halls, please evacuate immediately. This is an emergency alert."
I don't know what, but something's happening. I have to find Noiz.
After glancing at the cube in my hand, I stand up slowly, using the shelf for support.
The burn on my side hurts like hell. But I can't let that stop me.
I open my bag and wake up Ren.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Things are getting kinda ugly. I'm in pretty bad shape too, so I need your help."

name: 蓮
message: "Are you okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not really, but I'm just gonna have to push through it."
I leave the room clutching my side, walking as fast as I can manage.
Out in the hall, the alarm is even louder.
I can hear some kind of rumbling in the distance. Probably the hallways being "sealed" or whatever.
Is Noiz even still on this floor?
I put the cube in the palm of my hand and press the eye like Noiz said.

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "You called?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is Noiz on this floor?"

name: ウサギモドキ
message: "No."
I guess I should try heading up for now...
